notes.text:
Thanks to the drastic meta change brought by amazones....Log was a breeze, took 28wins in Log to hit KoG (6first games, i was testing out different decks)
The deck :
I would play 3ties if i had them.
Monster set up was perfect.
3super rush perfect for amazones and ssa.
2econ is staple.
3pulse mines is mandatory (mvp).
Tech cards: mirror wall, paelozic, regulation, could have been switched for most defensive cards out there, curse of anubis, windstorm, wall of D...
If you have any question dont hesitate to ask!
